message.body: Bank question: if my credit card is completely paid off but I have a refund of $56 coming, will it just sit on the card until I spend it or where will it go?

Jenna this is one way people get trapped into credit card programs. jus pay the balance in full. the credit or refund should be on the next statement. if you pay the amount less the refund due to you you will pay interest...A LOT...... Make sense? if not call me... Love you.
